title: Il Sole 24 Ore (italian financial newspaper) title serif
content:
Hi,  
I’m looking for the font in which the titles of “Il Sole 24 Ore” newspaper are set in.  
Here are some examples:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font01low_4094.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font02low_4500.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font03low_6429.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font4low_3874.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font05low_6079.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font06low_4905.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font07low_6331.jpg)

The newspaper has been redesigned by [Cases i Associats](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001/http:/www.cases-assoc.com/) not so long ago.

Feel free to ask for more letters if needed, I’ll post other scans.

Good search,  
bye

 [‹ Los Angeles Magazine Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37767 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help identifying distressed font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37784 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Giacomo Cesana

comments.content: Ciao Giacomo, what you’re looking for is the [Mercury Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828032001/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100016) typeface family from Hoefler & Frere-Jones, I think.

Ciao Antonio,  
you’re right!  
I was pretty sure it was from The Funt Bureau, but H&F-J was actually the place to look at.  
Puzzle solved in one move.  
Buona giornata (mentre gli americani dormono noi italiani ci diamo da fare!).

momo  
––  
All Good Cretins Go To Heaven
Ciao, Giacomo. Yeah, we were all asleep. But it’s always fun to see a beautiful language in beautiful type.
